page.title: 12Attitudes (2)In Handsacre
page.content: There are only a few Amenities in Handsacre because it is only a small village.There are 4 pubs a telephone box and a Guest House.Over flowing litter bins look untidy as well as badly kept play areas.This page shows what Amenities people would like in the area of Handsacre.The list runs down from the most popular idea to the least popular. 1.Youth Club. 12.Paths. 23.Swim pool 2.Sport Centre13.Clinic.24.Park. 3.Pub. 14.Cinema.25.Car park. 4.College. 15.Toilet.26.More shops. 5.Post Office.16.Library27.Fire station 6.Doctors. 17.Bank. 28.Trainstation 7.Gas. 18.Tennis.29.Sport field 8.R.C.Church 19.Winebar30.Church hall 9.BMX Track. 20.Market.31.Chemist. 10.Takeaway. 21.Postbox. 11.Disco. 22.Smokeless Zone.
